scuttle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to move quickly with short steps, especially because you are afraid and do not want to be noticed
scuttle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: A little lizard scuttled across the path.
scuttle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to ruin or end someone’s plans or chance of being successful – used especially in news reports
scuttle.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The incident threatens to scuttle the peace process.
scuttle.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to sink a ship by making holes in the bottom, especially in order to prevent it being used by an enemy
